Replace.Text: Tianlu Trading is willing to do this, you are in luck
Sorry, I can't make a claim for Tianlu Trade without permission. After all, I'm not in power.
Our boss said that he will give you priority when there is business in the future. It depends on whether you are willing to sign this agreement.
You are welcome
Oh? If you miss this opportunity, it won't come back again.
You want to fight with me too? Then I'll fight you to the end!
Lie down
The messengers have been settled. You're welcome. I said I'd take care of everything.
The boss said he doesn't have time to deal with these things. Let's do it another day.
The merchant representative from Tianlu Trade is on the way. I hope you can make a lot of money too.
snort...
Do you want to learn some lessons too?
Hey, what are you doing? Are you here to discuss business with our boss?
Come with me, Tianlu Trade is very big, I'm afraid you will get lost
I'm free, let's go.
Where are you from? I'm curious.
Hey, are you sending so many people here to cause trouble?
Then leave quickly!
Your recent expansion behavior is a threat to us. We are not to be trifled with.
Don't blame us for retaliating.
I tell you, I saw through all your tricks. If anyone dares to come, I will teach them a lesson.
You are such a jerk.
Your religious people are spreading heresy again, get them out of here
Hey, you guy...
Sorry, I couldn't keep...
Smooth transaction
Smooth transaction
Smooth transaction
Okay, that's it.
Okay, that's it.
Okay, that's it.
With such a small security force, are you sure that your trade with Tianlu will not be disrupted? Tianlu Trade does not want to suffer such a loss.
Luwu is concerned about your weak army
Tianyuan Divine Realm-Jiusi
Divine Realm Tianyuan
Luwu
Ha, it's quite quiet without you here. Have you run into any trouble?
Kunlun Gun Technique

Immediately gain Luwu and Yingzhao after creating a capital, upgrading a unit will not end its turn, all units ignore the [ICON_Movement] movement penalty for terrain and crossing rivers, do not suffer combat strength loss when injured, and all units gain +10 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when attacking uninjured units

There are always idiots who rush up when they see a freight line. If they don't listen to advice, we can only teach them a lesson. He is a nice guy and doesn't pick places. He can fall asleep as soon as he lies down. - Lu Wu
Advocacy of force
Dislikes civilizations with small standing armies
+{1_Amount} [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength, from Luwu leader trait
